feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: disable tracing in dev mode by default by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1316
  • feat: add deployment statistics table to db by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1312
  • ENG-2143 fix: add missing default org id on first login by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1318
  • ci: split build from build and push in docker ci by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1319
  • bug(python): Activity marker doesn't work on async by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1310
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/cloudflare/circl from 1.3.7 to 1.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1315
  • [ENG-2146]: install all py-sdk deps by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1324
  • chore(deps): bump protobuf from 4.24.3 to 4.25.8 in /proto by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1323
  • fix: make linter work again by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1321
  • feat: add Anthropic integration by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1322
  • feat: values by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1320
  • bug(python): Add asyncio function to deterministic by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1327
  • feat: support oss and enterprise system tests by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1325
  • Add system test for asyncio.run & subscribe by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1329
  • fix(sessions-callbacks): forbidden in activity should not be a 500 by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1331
  • docs: add pyak values docs; add sys test for sessions by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1333
  • chore: update pyak version to 0.6.0 by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1334
  • feat: enterprise worker management and throttling by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1298

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.17.9...v0.18.0

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: allow disable workflow executor poller by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1335

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.18.0...v0.18.1

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.18.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • doc: add py sdk docs for when not to run functions in activities by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1336
  • feat(python): More Pythoninc store API by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1330
  • bug(python): Document all Python SDK modules by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1337
  • bug(python): Better error when calling next_event in activity by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1332
  • bug(python): In asyncio exception, value can be a coroutine. by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1339

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.18.1...v0.18.2

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.18.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add anthropic connection test func by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1341
  • fix(ENG-2161): executor race condition fix by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1344

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.18.3...v0.18.4
